title: The One Ring, The Binding Ring (9R+1)
text:
Set:	Reflections
Card Type:	The One Ring
Strength:	+1
Vitality:	+1
Game Text:	Fellowship: Add 2 burdens to play a ring from your draw deck. Maneuver: Exert bearer to wear The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add a burden instead.
Rarity:	R+
